channel.title: I’ll Always Remember Those Stars in Your Eyes! - Scum and Villainy
channel.description:
NUMBER OF SESSIONS: 8 - Being able to attend each session is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
SPECIAL REQUEST: For the first 48 hours please only RSVP if you are not a white cis man. CONTENT WARNING: Violence, drugs, possibly sex, other vices.
DESCRIPTION: Love. That’s what got you into this mess. That’s why you’re sitting here in this piece of shit spaceship, about to risk your life breaking into a high security prison with just a blaster and a lucky charm. But at least you’re not the only one. Some people don’t believe in fate, but what else can you call it when shit like this happens. I mean finding them, all in that bar, your new crew, each with someone they want to bust out of Isotropa Max Secure - all willing to die for the chance to hold their loved ones in their arms one last time. Cause let's be honest, we may not all get out of there alive. So here’s to you lady luck, and to you my darling. I’m coming for you.
SAFETY TOOLS IN USE: CATS, X-Card, Design Pallet, Roses and Thorns, Lines & Veils. The Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct will be followed as well as an Open Door Policy (https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html).
RSVP OPEN ACCESS TIME: 06/21/2020 12:00 PM PDT
LINKS TO EACH SESSION:
* July 11 - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M9lKftePUYxbXIp9bgj * July 18 - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M9lKxiIwxhcQ9xwnhWV * July 25 - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M9lLNCv5Y6k4RwGzTcH * Aug 1 - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M9lLux5CXmkW83PNMlA * Aug 8 - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M9lMHhGhgSsrZs6iUE8 * Aug 15 - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M9lMf6RMpbHhxVwZEB3 * Aug 22 - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M9lN21UomhIKCB98OXX * Aug 29 - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M9lNIRC2WrwZUwqmkmR
Additional details about the sessions are provided in the Gauntlet Hangouts posting.
